DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate Acceptance Commitment Therapy 's ( ACT ) implementation outcomes least good traditional cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) .
DOC.criteria: 1. age 18 old 2. smoke least ten cigarette per day ( eligible NRT ) do least past 12 month 3. want quit smoke next 30 day 4. concurrently use nicotine tobacco product want quit use within next 30 day 5. willing randomly assign either group 6. willing able speak read English 7. willing medically eligible use NRT 8. resides U.S. , expect continue least 12 month 9. participate smoke cessation intervention ( include intervention trial ) 10. regular access telephone . The exclusion criterion opposite inclusion criterion list . In addition exclude : 1. anyone pregnant breast feed 2. heart attack past 30 day 3. unstable angina 4. evidence arrhythmia past 6 month 5. history severe skin reaction adhesive patch .
